title: First time players in ranked
body: There really should be something against this, because I've been seeing first time players A LOT in ranked like yesterday I saw a first-time Lux who didn't know how to play her, just picked her because she supposedly countered our adc, personally I think you should require Lv.4 mastery on a champ to use them in ranked.

Teammate 1: "Guys, We need a Tank"

Teammate 2: "Hey Support, play a tank" 

Last Pick Support: "Sorry guys, I don't have any support tanks at level 4"

Or worse, you could have a guy autofilled to support who doesn't have a support at all at level 4.

Here's the same problem that always comes with it: Picking for an ally.
You wouldn't be able to pick that OP champion anymore for the last guy on your team as first pick, just because you don't play it.

I definitely see your point (And that was actually one of my first thoughts as well) but I have also seen people "Picking for an ally" and then one of the two of them ends up not completing the swap and someone gets screwed (Usually the entire team.)
